skins.selfIntroduction: I am Z20 Karl Galster, Iron Blood Z-class 1936-Type destroyer, the sole survivor of the Z17 type destroyers. After being being handed over to the Northern Union, I was renamed "§á§â§à§é§ß§í§Û." Being separated from my sisters and living alone sure was rough...
skins.acquisition: Z20, Karl Galster, reporting in! Where's my welcoming party?
skins.details: I'll make all your concerns go "poof!" How's that, Commander? Feel better?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, let me teach you the right way to breathe while running. It's good for both attacking and retreating!
skins.secretaryIdle2: As long as I'm in a good mood, I can enjoy any scenery!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Protschny? Don't call me by that name!
skins.secretaryTouch: Hmm? You want to go on a run with me?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Hehe, how do you like my curves?
